item.title: [pi] portal problem?
item.dc:creator: @turmoilz11 turmoilz11
item.description:
@turmoilz11 wrote:

ok problem is i’m adding the godwars portal at the trollheim place and when i add i get errors.

this is my error

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:549: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Killcount
location: class server.model.players.Client
if (c.Killcount >= 20) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

here’s my code
case 2492:
if (c.Killcount >= 20) {
c.getDH().sendOption4(“Armadyl”, “Bandos”, “Saradomin”, “Zamorak”);
c.dialogueAction = 20;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need 20 kill count before teleporting to a boss chamber.”);
}
break;

appreciate help guys.
